message.content: Neural Networks. This paper belongs to the sub-category of Neural Networks. The paper discusses the use of a recurrent neural network as an associative memory for invariant object recognition. It introduces the concept of object representation by continuous attractors and learning attractors by pattern completion. The paper also discusses the limitations of naive methods for learning attractors and proposes a superior method based on pattern completion. Overall, the paper focuses on the use of neural networks for learning continuous attractors.
